titles.title: A resolution to improve the Ethics in Government Act.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XXXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to require a Member, officer, or employee, when returning or making reimbursement for a gift in violation of a certain rule, to submit a written report on such incident to the Senate Ethics Committee within 48 hours after the return or reimbursement.
